Package io.github.jgame.math

Class PolygonCollide

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.jgame.math.PolygonCollide
  • public class PolygonCollide
extends java.lang.Object
    Implementation of seperate axis theorem: Good video resource

        public void scaleTo​(double scale)

        Parameters:

        Throws:
        java.lang.UnsupportedOperationException - Implementation not working yet.

      • restore

        public void restore()
        Restore the PolygonCollide to it's unrotated, unscaled, and untranslated self.

      • getCenter

        public void getCenter()
        Get the midpoint of the polygon by averaging all the vertices.

        Get the polygon from all of the vertices.
        Returns:
        Polygon

      • saveVerts

        private void saveVerts()
        Checkpoint the vertices into the untransformed array. Call this before applying AffineTransformations such as rotation and scaling so that the polygon can be reset.

      • getAxes

        private java.util.LinkedList<java.lang.Double> getAxes()
        Get the axis of the polygon in the form of slopes.

        Returns the all slopes in the polygon.

        Returns:
        List of slopes.

      • projectPoint

        private double projectPoint​(double[] point,
                            double axisSlope)
        Get the projected point on a axis by using a perpendicular line and calculating the intercepts.
        Parameters:
        point - double[x, y]
        axisSlope - double (slope of axis to project onto)
        Returns:
        double[x, y] of projected point
